INSERT INTO `batch_indicator_results` SELECT NULL, -- {INDICATOR_ID} AS `batch_indicator_id`, -- {SUBGROUPS} AS `subgroups`, `main_data`.`area_id`, `main_data`.`year` AS `timeperiod`, ROUND(`main_data`.`numerator` / `main_data`.`denominator` * 100, 2) AS `data_value`, `main_data`.`numerator` AS `numerator`, `main_data`.`denominator` AS `denominator`, `main_data`.`classification`, -- {USER_ID}, NOW()
FROM ( SELECT `areas`.`id` AS `area_id`, `public_expenditure`.`year`, `public_expenditure`.`total_public_expenditure_education` AS `numerator`, `public_expenditure`.`total_public_expenditure` AS `denominator`, CONCAT('Finances') AS `classification` FROM `areas` JOIN `public_expenditure` ON `public_expenditure`.`area_id` = `areas`.`id` WHERE `areas`.`area_level_id` = -- {LEVEL} ) AS `main_data`
GROUP BY `main_data`.`year`, `main_data`.`area_id`, `main_data`.`classification`
